text: khuda un logon ko jo eemaan lae aur achchhe (achchhe) kaam karate rahe zaroor behisht ke un baagon mein ja pahunchaega jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain aur jo kaafir hain vah (duniya mein) chain karate hain aur is tarah (bephikree se khaate (peete) hain jaise chaarapae khaate peete hain aur aakhir) unaka thikaana jahannum hai
